CustomField.description: The value in this field will be "Inside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Management Hold Removed-QC] is equal to blank AND NOW() is less than or equal to the [Mgmt Hold Removed Target Time] The value in this field will be "Outside SLA" if the following conditions are true: [Management Hold Removed -QC] is equal to blank AND NOW() is greater than the [Mgmt Hold Removed Target Time]
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Management_Hold_Removed__c) && (NOW() <= Mgmt_Hold_Removed_Target_Time__c), "Inside SLA", IF(ISBLANK(Management_Hold_Removed__c) && (NOW() > Mgmt_Hold_Removed_Target_Time__c), "Outside SLA", "") )
CustomField.label: Mgmt Hold Removed (W) SLA
